message:
SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 7
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
7
From software localization to ontology localization:
Similarities
• Internationalization:
– Lexical content : characters and symbols handled by the computer 
(ASCII encoding, UNICODE, etc.) 
– Grammatical content: characters, syntactic structures and symbols 
used in certain ontology languages (RDF(S), OWL)
– Representation paradigm layer: frames, semantic networks, DL,
(Ontologies)
• Localization:
– Lexical-terminological content: terms or words used to name 
ontology elements.
– Conceptual content: conceptualization decisions: granularity, 
expresiveness, perspective, etc., mainly in domain ontologies.
– Pragmatic content: final result of the model (GUI, etc.)
speaker: SYSTEM
